text:
Chapter 3
How to Develop a Skillful Forecasting
Model
“Here is a dataset, now develop a forecast.” This is the normal situation that most practitioners
ﬁnd themselves in when getting started on a new time series forecasting problem. You are not
alone if you are in this situation right now. In this tutorial, I want to give you a speciﬁc and
actionable procedure that you can use to work through your time series forecasting problem
